snippet: Zhang Ziyi, sued Apple Daily, a well-known tabloid newspaper, and Next Magazine Publishing, over articles saying she was paid to have sex with Bo Xilai, the deposed Communist Party official.
abstract: Zhang Ziyi, one of China’s most famous actresses, files a libel suit against two prominent Hong Kong news organizations over articles saying she was paid to have sex with Bo Xilai, the deposed Communist Party official
lead_paragraph: Zhang Ziyi, sued Apple Daily, a well-known tabloid newspaper, and Next Magazine Publishing, over articles saying she was paid to have sex with Bo Xilai, the deposed Communist Party official.

headline.main: China: Actress Sues Publications Over Bo Allegations
headline.print_headline: China: Actress Sues Publications Over Bo Allegations
